body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.31 is now available.

What's new in this release:
New version of the Gecko engine based on Firefox 21.
Joystick force feedback support on Mac OS X.
Window management fixes in the Mac driver.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
